annonstext:
Do you enjoy hands-on laboratory work and in a supportive role and enjoy working in while contributing to the important development of biosimilars? This is a chance for the right person to join a dedicated team working as a laboratory technician to support cultivation activities within upstream process. 

Xbrane Biopharma is a biotechnology company which develops and manufactures biosimilars. You will be working in brand new lab facilities located at Solna Campus. We will interview candidates continuously and welcome your application today! 

JOB DESCRIPTION
As Laboratory technician you will be a part of a team of seven colleagues working with upstream process development (USP). You will support the team with a variety of laboratory tasks to facilitate cultivation activities.

Main Responsibilities will include but are not limited to: 
-	Daily/weekly preparation of cultivation equipment (e.g., bioreactors & incubators) and buffers/media prior and post runs.
-	Preparation of sterile buffers and cultivation media and feeds (autoclavation/sterile filtration), and plates as needed.
-	Maintenance of relevant laboratory instrumentation and control testing. 
-	Assist in routine sampling during cultivation, including sample preparation and analysis 
-	Assist in various post harvesting treatments, e.g., homogenization, depth filtration etc.
-	Record data and results in specified forms (paper and electronic) with accuracy and responsibility.
-	Perform certain routine lab work like plasmid preparation, SDS-PAGE/blotting etc, as needed.
-	Assist in ordering laboratory supplies.
-	Organizing the daily work in the washing and sterilisation laboratories.
-	Necessary waste handling (e.g., autoclavation of biological waste & disinfection of cell suspensions including their disposal) and preparation of relevant stock solutions.
-	Stock up USP labs with necessary consumables.
-	Maintain USP -80°C, -20°C freezers & fridges in a well-organized and good state.

QUALIFICATIONS
The right candidate has a relevant university education and/or adequate work experience. You have documented experience of laboratory work, and it is a merit if you have experience of tasks associated with cultivation of bacteria and/or mammalian cell lines. Strong computer skills and fluent in English, both speaking and in writing is required.  If you speak Swedish it is an advantage. 

To succeed in the role, you have a systematic way of working and proven good ability to plan and organize your own work. You are thorough, service minded and enjoy working hands-on in the laboratory. You like to contribute to open communication and constructive teamwork where strong collaboration, initiative and responsibility are in focus.

Xbrane Biopharma AB
Xbrane Biopharma is a Swedish biotechnology company which develops and manufactures biosimilars. Xbrane has a patented protein production platform and world-leading expertise within biosimilar development. This is a company with an entrepreneurial spirit that focuses on being creative and coming up with new ideas as well as on following a rigorous process to bring those ideas to fruition. Xbrane’s headquarter is located at Solna Campus, just outside of Stockholm, for more information see www.xbrane.com.

Share our values; Make it happen, Beat yesterday, Impossible is nothing and We win as one

Poolia Life Science
